               Di Bonaventura Pictures(2007). Length : 127min                 


 The passage from this world to the fantasy kingdom of Stormhold is through   
 a breech in a wall by an English village. In the 1800s, a boy becomes a man  
 when he ventures through the breech to prove his love for the village        
 beauty by finding a fallen star. The star is no lump of rock, but a maiden,  
 Yvaine, and Tristan, the youth, is not the only one searching for her:       
 three witches, led by Lamia, want her heart to make them young. The sons of  
 the dead king of Stormhold want her because she possesses a ruby that will   
 give one of them title to the throne.                                        
                                                                              


                           Happy Hacker Industries
